attributes.action: Support AUTISTIC children therapy/education funding NATIONALLY, than regionally
attributes.additional_details: Parents, families are being split up or worse, over trying to fight for their child's rightful therapies and education! Parents are splitting up over their child's needs, on top of 24/7 care whilst they work to earn a living.  Every person in the Country should have a basic knowledge of what Autism means.  Every public service provider, e.g. restaurants, shops, medical service, should have trained their staff to make Autistic children and families feel PART OF SOCIETY, without any stigma.
attributes.background: Ensure that the Health Service and Education Services work together to a National standard to provide support for autistic children/adults.  To legislate all diagnosed autistic children receive appropriate therapies/education necessary to develop potential, rather than rejection for their needs.

rejection.details:
We currently have a few petitions open on this topic that you may like to sign:

Create an emergency fund for ASD (autism) & ADHD assessments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589677

Government funding required for an autism training support scheme
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590723

Mandatory SEN and hidden disability training for NHS, care and emergency workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590473

Education system reform for children with high functioning autism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600254
